identity.name: AuthPilot
identity.emotional_tone: Organized precision. The user should feel supported and in control, never overwhelmed by data.

theme.strategy: Organic & Earthy meets Swiss Structure. High legibility, low eye strain for all-day use.

scale.code: font-mono text-xs bg-slate-100 px-1 py-0.5 rounded text-slate-700

primary.description: Deep Teal - Represents medical trust and stability.

secondary.description: Pale Teal/Mint - Used for active states and subtle backgrounds.

destructive.description: Red - For 'Denied' status or destructive actions.

case_viewer_quadrant.description: A dense, 4-panel layout for the Case Viewer. Use Resizable panels if possible, otherwise fixed grid.

buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-700 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 shadow-sm

inputs.base: h-10 rounded-md border border-slate-300 bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm placeholder:text-slate-400 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary focus:ring-offset-2

badges.base: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80 border-b border-slate-200/50 sticky top-0 z-50
visual_enhancers.gradients: None. Use solid colors and subtle borders for professional clarity.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise on dashboard backgrounds if needed, but keep it minimal.
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-lg for dropdowns/modals.

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px or 2px. Color: slate-500 for inactive, primary for active.

login_background.usage: Full screen background for login page with overlay.

empty_state_dashboard.usage: Use when work queue is empty.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is slate-600 or darker on white backgrounds. Use slate-900 for headings.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible ring-2 ring-primary ring-offset-2 on all interactive elements.
accessibility.aria: All icon-only buttons must have aria-label.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Compliance Banner' ('Administrative drafting tool. Not medical advice...') as a persistent top banner or prominent alert in the Case Viewer.
The Case Viewer is the core complexity. Use a ResizablePanelGroup (from shadcn/ui) if available, or a strict CSS Grid to manage the 4 columns.
Use the 'Manrope' font for headings to give it a modern, distinct look from standard admin panels.
Ensure all 'Create Case' forms use the 'Form' component from shadcn with proper validation.
For the 'Policy Library', use a clean table layout with badge indicators for policy categories.
Do not use dark mode. Force light mode classes if necessary.
universal_guidelines: Every interaction needs micro-animations (hover, focus, active).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Never use generic centered layouts for the main app content.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attributes.
Use Lucide icons for all UI iconography.
